title: Windows
description: The Windows brand is characterized by a modern and versatile color palette. The primary color, a vibrant blue (HEX #0078D7), represents innovation and technology, forming the cornerstone of Windows' identity. Complementing this are deep tones such as navy (#002050) and various bright accents like orange (#FFB900), red (#D83B01, #E81123), magenta (#B4009E), and purple (#5C2D91). Green hues, from emerald (#008272) to forest green (#107C10), are also incorporated, symbolizing growth and sustainability. These colors are sourced from Microsoft's official trademark documentation.
